rules.description: Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
Home => Cmd+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line)
End => Cmd+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line)
Ctrl+Up/down arrow => Up/down arrow (Move cursor up/down)
Swap "command + tab" with "control + tab" optional shift.
Double tab and hold left_command to become left_control. Once released, returns to left_command. Useful for scrolling through windows with left_control + tab
